speaker: President.
english: President. Some of the issues that you have raised should be addressed to Mrs Ferrero-Waldner, who is not here at the moment, whereas many of your other questions will be answered as part of the debate on the Euro-Mediterranean Parliamentary Assembly (EMPA), which will take place in due course.
original: President. Some of the issues that you have raised should be addressed to Mrs Ferrero-Waldner, who is not here at the moment, whereas many of your other questions will be answered as part of the debate on the Euro-Mediterranean Parliamentary Assembly (EMPA), which will take place in due course.
agenda_item: Results of the informal Council of foreign ministers (10-11 March 2006) (debate)
